title: Nick Turani & Our Most Offensive Segment Yet (A New One)
description:
Subscribe, rate, and leave a review! Nick Turani joins us for the entire show. He tells us about how he felt after losing Surviving Barstool, give us some great nba insight, tells us about the formation of ANUS, and much more. He also joins us for AITA Thursday and Voicemails. Let us know what you think on twitter: @KFCRadio @KFCBarstool @FeitsBarstool @Nickturani Subscribe to the KFC Radio Youtube Channel for the full podcast: www.youtube.com/c/kfcradio Subscribe to the KFC Radio Clips Youtube Channel for the best clips: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCspldj_2KhBix7eVxe2H8xg


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
